    • Method Detail

      • setContinueOnJsonError

        public void setContinueOnJsonError(boolean continueOnJsonError)
        If it is false, then JmxTrans will stop when one of the JSON configuration file is invalid. Otherwise, it will just print an error and continue processing.
        Parameters:
        continueOnJsonError -

      • setJsonDirOrFile

        public void setRunEndlessly(boolean runEndlessly)
